com.valiantys.nfeed.api

Interface IFieldValueService


  • public interface IFieldValueService
    Service allowing manipulation of Elements Connect custom fields actual values.
    Using the methods below, you can set and get custom field content.

    The value type must match the Elements Connect custom field type :

    • Elements Connect : java.lang.String (key content)
    • Elements Connect legacy : java.lang.String (key content)
    • Elements Connect Date : java.util.Date
    • Elements Connect DateTime: java.util.Date
    • Elements Connect User : com.atlassian.jira.ApplicationUser

    Example usage: 

     
 fieldValueService.setFieldValue("ISSUE-12345", standardConnectCustomField.getId(), "id-1");
 fieldValueService.setFieldValue("ISSUE-12345", dateCustomField.getId(), new java.util.Date());

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void computeFieldsValue(String issueKey, List<String> customFieldsIds)
      Retrieves all custom fields from passed custom fields ids and compute their values according to the given issue.
      String getDbValue(String issueKey, String customFieldId)
      Returns Elements Connect custom field string value as it is stored in Jira database.
      Collection<?> getFieldValues(String issueKey, String customFieldId)
      Returns values contained in the Elements Connect custom field.
      void setFieldValue(String issueKey, String customFieldId, Object fieldValue)
      Sets an Elements Connect custom field value.
      void setFieldValues(String issueKey, String customFieldId, Collection<?> fieldValues)
      Sets an Elements Connect custom field values.

    • Method Detail

      • setFieldValue

        void setFieldValue(String issueKey,
                   String customFieldId,
                   Object fieldValue)
        Sets an Elements Connect custom field value. This works exactly the same as using setFieldValues(String, String, Collection) with a Collection containing this single element. Setting null will set an empty collection.
        Parameters:
        issueKey - key of issue to set value
        customFieldId - custom field id (customfield_XXX)
        fieldValue - field value.

      • setFieldValues

        void setFieldValues(String issueKey,
                    String customFieldId,
                    Collection<?> fieldValues)
        Sets an Elements Connect custom field values. The values must match the type of the custom field (see class declaration javadoc). When setting values on a single value field, only the first value in the collection will be taken into account. If the issue does not exist or if the custom field does not exist or is not a Elements Connect field, the method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        issueKey - key of issue to set values
        customFieldId - custom field id (customfield_XXX)
        fieldValues - field values

      • getFieldValues

        Collection<?> getFieldValues(String issueKey,
                             String customFieldId)
        Returns values contained in the Elements Connect custom field. Single value field return a collection with at most one value. If the issue does not exist or if the custom field does not exist or is not a Elements Connect field, the method returns an empty list.
        Parameters:
        issueKey - key of issue to retrieve values from
        customFieldId - the custom field id
        Returns:
        a collection of values

      • computeFieldsValue

        void computeFieldsValue(String issueKey,
                        List<String> customFieldsIds)
        Retrieves all custom fields from passed custom fields ids and compute their values according to the given issue. If the issue does not exist or if the custom field does not exist or is not a Elements Connect field, the method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        issueKey - key of issue to compute values from
        customFieldsIds - custom field ids
        Since:
        2018-06-20 (0.1.1 version)

      • getDbValue

        String getDbValue(String issueKey,
                  String customFieldId)
        Returns Elements Connect custom field string value as it is stored in Jira database. If the issue does not exist or if the custom field does not exist or is not an Elements Connect field, the method returns null.
        Parameters:
        issueKey - the issue key
        customFieldId - the custom field id
        Returns:
        the value stored in database
        Since:
        2019-06-18 (0.2.0 version)
